data: It was the story behind the biggest story on Mars—how Fate had grimly reckoned with the Rockhead Rastol—but Scott Warren of Galactic News couldn’t write it... yet.
It was the story behind the biggest story on Mars--how Fate had grimly reckoned with the Rockhead Rastol--but Scott Warren of Galactic News couldn't write it ... yet.
